TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 控件在数据操作完成后引发的事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for an event that is raised by the control after a data operation has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类在 、 、和事件中用于在 数据源控件执行后传递有关数据库操作的信息。The class is used in the , , , and events to pass information about a database operation after it is performed by the data source control. 此信息包括操作影响的行数、 用于执行该操作的数据源的对象，以及产生的任何异常信息。This information includes the number of rows affected by the operation, the object that the data source used to perform the operation, and any exception information that resulted. 通过添加事件处理程序委托来处理 、 或 事件，您可以检查此数据并执行所需的任何其他的后期处理。By adding an event handler delegate to handle the , , or events, you can examine this data and perform any additional post processing required. 控件公开了许多事件，您可以处理这些事件，以便在数据操作过程中使用基础数据对象。The control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying data objects during the course of a data operation. 下表列出了事件和关联的 事件处理程序类，以更好地指导您使用控件的数据操作的生命周期 。The following table lists the events and associated and event handler classes, to better guide you to the various events that correspond to the life cycle of a data operation using the control. |事件Event|EventArgsEventArgs|EventHandlerEventHandler| |-----------|---------------|------------------| | 在检索数据之前发生。 occurs before the data is retrieved.||| | 在执行插入、更新或删除操作之前发生。, , occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.||| |在 数据检索、插入、更新或删除操作完成后，将发生、、。, , , occur after the data retrieval, insert, update, or delete operations completes.||| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 类检查在使用 带有存储过程的控件填充控件时返回的输出参数的返回值和值 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to examine the return value and values of output parameters that are returned when using a control with a stored procedure to populate a control. 该存储过程选择中显示的数据 ，但也将其他信息传递回调用方，如整数输出参数和返回值。The stored procedure selects data that is displayed in the , but also passes other information back to the caller, such as an integer output parameter and a return value. 用于存储过程的参数包含在集合中，它包含将 信息从 Web 窗体传递到存储过程的参数，以及将信息传递回窗体的参数。The parameters that the uses for the stored procedure are contained by the collection, and consist of parameters that pass information from the Web form to the stored procedure as well as parameters that pass information back to the form. 这些参数的属性设置为 和 。The property of these parameters is set to and . summary.span: 获取受数据库操作影响的行数。

span.span: Gets the number of rows affected by a database operation.

value.span: 受数据库操作影响的行数。

span.span: The number of rows affected by a database operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有操作都返回受该操作影响的行数。All operations return the number of rows affected by the operation. 属性的值与 、 和方法的返回值的值相同 。The property has the same value as the return value of the , , and methods. 调用方法并且数据源设置为 模式时，在所有情况下，返回值均为0。When the method is called and the data source is set to mode, the return value is 0 in all cases.

summary.span: 获取提交到数据库的数据库命令。

span.span: Gets the database command submitted to the database.

value.span: 对象，它表示提交到数据库的数据库命令。

span.span: The object that represents the database command submitted to the database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以处理 、 、 或 事件，以便在控件将 其提交到数据库后，对其进行检查和操作 。You can handle the , , , or event to examine and manipulate the properties of the after it is submitted by the control to the database. 属性使你能够在数据库操作通过其属性执行后访问任何输出参数中的返回值和值 ，并提供 属性（表示已提交到数据库中的 SQL 查询、命令或存储过程名称）。The property enables you to access return values and values in any output parameters after the database operation is performed through its property, as well as the property, which represents the SQL query, command, or stored procedure name that was submitted to the database. 任何输出参数都是特定于参数的参数，这些参数具有 对象的属性或值 。Any output parameters are specifically from parameters that have an or value for the property of the object. 返回值来自具有值的参数 。A return value is from a parameter that has a value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了在使用带有存储过程的控件时，如何检查 output 参数的值 。The following code example demonstrates how to examine the values of output parameters when using a control with a stored procedure. 集合包含 用于存储过程的参数，并包含将信息从 Web 窗体传递到存储过程的参数，以及将信息传递回窗体的参数。The collection contains the parameters that the uses for the stored procedure, and consists of parameters that pass information from the Web form to the stored procedure as well as parameters that pass information back to the form. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 为数据库在数据操作期间引发的任何异常获取包装。

span.span: Gets a wrapper for any exceptions thrown by the database during a data operation.

value.span: 一个 ，它将数据库引发的任何异常都包装在其 属性中。

span.span: An that wraps any exceptions thrown by the database in its property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性不表示数据库操作引发的实际异常。The property does not represent the actual exception thrown by the database operation. 您可以使用属性访问引发的异常 。You can access the thrown exception using the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否已处理数据库引发的异常。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an exception thrown by the database has been handled.

value.span: 如果数据库引发的异常已被处理并且不应由 控件引发，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if an exception thrown by the database has been handled and should not be thrown by the control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果数据库引发了异常，则 属性将设置为 `false` ，并且该异常将由属性包装 。If the database throws an exception, the property is set to `false` and the exception is wrapped by the property. 如果使用 ，则可以检查 属性并处理异常。If you use an , you can check the property and handle the exception. 如果处理异常，请将属性设置 为， `true` 否则 控件将引发异常。If you handle the exception, set the property to `true` or the control will throw an exception.
